scripts.docs:build: documentation build src/** -f html -o docs -a public -a private -a protected -a undefined --config documentation.yml --theme docs_theme
scripts.docs:build:json: documentation build src/** -f json -o docs/docs.json -a public -a private -a protected -a undefined --config documentation.yml --theme docs_theme
scripts.docs:build:md: documentation build src/** -f md -o docs/docs.md -a public -a private -a protected -a undefined --config documentation.yml --theme docs_theme
scripts.docs:serve: documentation serve src/** -a public -a private -a protected -a undefined --config documentation.yml --theme docs_theme
scripts.docs:serve:live: documentation serve --watch src/** -a public -a private -a protected -a undefined --config documentation.yml --theme docs_theme
